page.shortlink: api desktop api ui top menu height function
page.description: The UI_TOP_MENU_HEIGHT() function gets the height of a top menu (with optional width restriction).
page.syntax: Height as N = UI_TOP_MENU_HEIGHT(C menubar[,N width_limit])

argument.name: Height
argument.description: The height of the menu in inches.

argument.name: width_limit
argument.description: Optional. The maximum width of the menu.
